Text:
Talk about HIT AND RUN for this
Where did everyone go Downloaded 17 times and no one seeding

You have to edit file Line 17 in "bitrix/modules/main/install/install.php" from $def_lang="ru"; to $def_lang="en"; to be able to install in english from russian, easy enough but there is no License Key just DEMO.  If anyone can supply a Licence Key it would be much appreciated.
